pages.text: Everyone knows that $(item)Slime Blocks$() stick to other blocks when moved by a piston. In $(thing)Crucial$(), however, $(item)Slime Blocks$() come in various different colors.$(br2)Your typical green $(item)Slime Blocks$() can be dyed Red, or Blue. These dyed slime blocks do not connect to eachother, but they connect to normal blocks just fine.

Furthermore, red, green, and blue slime can be combined into cyan, magenta, and yellow slime.$(br2)These composite colors will only stick to the colors they're made of. For example, a $(item)Magenta Slime Block$() will stick to $(item)Red Slime Blocks$() and $(item)Blue Slime Blocks$(), but not $(item)Green Slime Blocks$(), or any of the other composite colors.
